</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	2.1.5.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The Investor and the Majority Block Shareholders shall execute, on the Closing Date, the Shareholders&#8217; Agreement, in the form of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit D
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, in order to establish the rules that will govern their relationship as shareholders of the Company.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S613079058DFA1F330F4EEC6C4F01439B">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 2.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Equity Interest
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, the number of Subscribed Shares (and the corresponding equity interest acquired by the Investor in the Company) and the Share Price were calculated as detailed in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit E
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;and were based on (i) the estimated adjusted EBITDA of the Company for the year ended December 31, 2015, in the total amount of R$ 185 million (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Estimated Adjusted EBITDA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;), multiplied by 9.5x, less (ii) the estimated Net Debt of the Company as of December 31, 2015, in the total amount of R$&#160;840 million (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Estimated Net Debt
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;), both of which were calculated in good faith pursuant to the method described in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibits B
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	G
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. The final equity interest of the Investor in the Company will be subject to the Post-Closing Adjustment in accordance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 3.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;below and in no circumstance whatsoever, by virtue of the Post-Closing Adjustment, the equity interest to be held by Investor shall be lower than 35% (thirty five per cent) of the Company&#8217;s total share capital (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Minimum Interest
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;) or higher than 47,5% (forty seven and a half per cent) of the Company&#8217;s total voting capital (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Maximum Interest
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE 3 &#8211; CLOSING CONSUMMATION AND POST-CLOSING PRICE ADJUSTMENT
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>

<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S72835D795D47DE729C54EC6C4F496FB0">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:96PX;">
	Section 3.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Closing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Upon the terms of this Agreement, the closing of the Transaction set forth in this Agreement, the Share Purchase Agreement and the Shareholders&#8217; Agreement (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Closing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;) shall take place at 10:00 a.m., on the Closing Date, at the offices of Mattos Filho, Veiga Filho, Marrey Jr. e Quiroga Advogados, located at Alameda Joaquim Eug&#234;nio de Lima, 447, in the City of S&#227;o Paulo, State of S&#227;o Paulo, Brazil, or as otherwise agreed by the Parties.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	3.1.1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;During the period comprised between the date of execution of this Agreement and the Closing Date, the Initial Shareholders undertake to carry on the Company&#8217;s business as currently conducted and only in
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	21

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the ordinary course of business, it being understood as not taking any of the actions listed in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sections 3.01(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

	Exhibit F
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, which shall not require prior approval of the Investor, however shall be informed to the Investor. The Parties agree that the negotiation and amendment of the lease agreement for the purposes of complying with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 7.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;and hedging the debt according to

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;can be taken without prior approval of the Investor, however shall be informed to the Investor.

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 3.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Closing Obligations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. At the Closing, the following actions and transactions shall be carried out, which actions and transactions shall all be deemed to take place simultaneously and no action or transaction shall be deemed to have been completed or any document delivered until such actions and transactions have been completed and the required documents delivered:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The Initial Shareholders shall hold the Subscription General Shareholders Meeting, and approve the matters set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 2.1.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

	(ii)
</FONT>

	boletim de subscri&#231;&#227;o

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">

	(iv)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

	escriturador
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	) in charge of the registration of the Company&#8217;s shares, therefore delivering the ownership of the Subscribed Shares to Investor, free and clear of Liens (except for the Shareholders&#8217; Agreement);

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">

	(v)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The Investor and the Majority Block Shareholders shall execute the Shareholders&#8217; Agreement, in the form of
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	; and

<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">

	(vi)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Initial Shareholders shall have obtained from the holders of non-voting preferred shares under the stock option agreement or warrants (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	bonus de subscri&#231;&#227;o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	) of the Company, express written waiver of any preemptive rights they may have in connection with the (a) subscription of new common shares by the Investor as a result of the implementation of the Post-Closing Adjustment as detailed in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;and

	(b)

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	subscription of the Subscribed Shares.
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage108"></A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	3.2.1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The payment of the Subscription Amount shall be received by the Company as follows: (i) one hundred Reais (R$ 100.00) shall be received as goodwill (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&#225;gio
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	) and accounted for as a capital reserve, and (ii) the remaining balance shall be received as payment for the Subscribed Shares and booked as capital stock.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	3.2.2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The Minutes of the Subscription General Shareholders Meeting will be drawn up in the Book of Minutes of Shareholders&#8217; Meetings of the Company and submitted to the Board of Trade of S&#227;o Paulo within five (5) Business Days after the Closing Date, at the sole expense of the Company.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	3.2.3.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The Parties hereby undertake to execute and sign any other instrument or document, as well as to provide all the applicable filings, registries and records that are necessary for this Agreement, the minutes of the Subscription General Shareholders Meeting and the Shareholders&#8217; Agreement to become valid and effective, including, but not limited to, any amendment that may possibly be required in order to fulfill a requirement of any applicable Governmental Authority.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_SFF49D2D7FA0AA3F29842EC6C4F9CA802">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:96PX;">
	Section 3.3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Actual Adjusted EBITDA and Actual Net Debt
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	3.3.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Within five (5) days of the earlier of (i) the issuance of the audited financial statements of the Company and Fermavi for the year ended on December 31, 2015, or (ii) March 31, 2016, the Parties shall cause the Company to prepare in good faith and deliver to the Initial Shareholders and the Investor, based on the audited financial statements of the Company and Fermavi for the year ended on December 31, 2015, prepared in conformity with IFRS, the following calculation, which shall be sent by the Company to the Investor and to the Initial Shareholders (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Post-Closing Notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;), which shall contain a statement of a duly authorized officer of the Company setting forth, in reasonable detail, (i) the calculation of the actual adjusted EBITDA of the Company, in Reais, for the year ended on December 31, 2015 (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Actual Adjusted EBITDA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;), calculated in good faith pursuant to the method described in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit G
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;hereto, and (ii) the calculation of the actual Net Debt of the Company, in Reais, as of December 31, 2015, adjusted by the Subscription Amount (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Actual Net Debt
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;), calculated in good faith pursuant to the method described in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit B
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;hereto. The Parties hereby acknowledge and agree that, for the purposes of the Post-Closing Adjustment Calculation, (a) the Actual Adjusted EBITDA shall, in any event, be limited to the maximum amount of two hundred million Reais (R$ 200,000,000) and any variation above such limit shall not have any effect to the Post-Closing Adjustment and (b) the Actual Net Debt shall not be, in any event, less than eight hundred million Reais (R$ 800,000,000) and any variation below such limit shall not have any effect to the Post-Closing Adjustment.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	23
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage109"></A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	3.3.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	If the Parties disagree with any of the calculations of (i) the Actual Adjusted EBITDA and/or (ii) the Actual Net Debt, the disagreeing Party shall deliver to the other Party and the Company a written notice of such disagreement (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Objection Notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;) no later than the date that is fifteen (15) Business Days after receipt of the Post-Closing Notice (such fifteen (15) Business Days period, the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Review Period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;). The Objection Notice shall set forth (i) any such disagreement, (ii) the calculation, as the case may be, of the Actual Adjusted EBITDA and/or of the Actual Net Debt, and (iii) the specific basis for such disagreement. During the Review Period, the Parties shall be permitted full access during normal business hours to (i) the books and records of the Company, including all supporting documentation used by the Company in preparation of the Actual Adjusted EBITDA and/or of the Actual Net Debt, and (ii) the accounting personnel of the Company involved in the preparation of the Post-Closing Notice.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	3.3.3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Upon receipt of the Objection Notice, Investor and Initial Shareholders shall negotiate in good faith to resolve any such disagreement. Any determination of the Actual Adjusted EBITDA or the Actual Net Debt agreed to in writing by Investor and Initial Shareholders shall be final, non-appealable and binding upon such Parties and their successors and assignees for the purposes of this Agreement and of the Share Purchase Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	3.3.4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	If Investor and Initial Shareholders are unable to resolve any disagreement as contemplated by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section&#160;3.3.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;within ten (10) Business Days after delivery of the Objection Notice, then Investor and Initial Shareholders shall cause the Company to, within five (5) Business Days following the expiration of such ten (10) Business Days period, submit the matter for determination to KPMG, and, if KPMG is not available, Deloitte, and if Deloitte and KPMG are not available, PwC. The accounting firm appointed in accordance herewith shall be referred to herein as the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Accounting Expert
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;. The Accounting Expert shall only consider those items of the Actual Adjusted EBITDA and/or Actual Net Debt calculated according to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibits B
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	G
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;and those amounts as to which the Initial Shareholders and the Investor have disagreed within the time periods and on the terms specified above and shall resolve the matter in accordance with the terms and provisions of this Agreement (including the definitions set forth herein) and with the application of IFRS as consistently applied in the preparation of the Financial Statements. The Accounting Expert shall act only as an expert and not as an arbitrator and is expressly limited to the selection of either the Investor&#8217;s position or the position of the Initial Shareholders on a disputed item (or a position in between the positions of the Initial Shareholders and the Investor) and it shall thus select as a resolution for each disputed matter the position of either the Initial Shareholders or the Investor (or a position in between the positions of the Initial Shareholders and the Investor) based solely on presentations and supporting material provided by the Investor and the Initial Shareholders and not pursuant to any independent review. The Accounting Expert may not impose an alternative resolution outside those bounds. The fees, costs and expenses of the Accounting Expert shall be borne by the Company.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	24
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage110"></A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	3.3.5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The Parties shall cooperate in good faith with the Accounting Expert in the carrying out of its mandate and shall furnish or cause the Company to furnish such Accounting Expert with such accounting data and other information as the Accounting Expert may reasonably request for the purposes of carrying out its mandate hereunder. The Accounting Expert shall have full access to the documents and personnel referred to in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section&#160;3.3.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;above and the other written information exchanged between the Company, the Investor and Initial Shareholders.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	3.3.6.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Subject to the terms of Accounting Expert&#8217;s mandate set forth under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 3.3.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, the Parties shall jointly instruct the Accounting Expert to determine, as soon as practicable and in any event no later than Fifteen (15) Business Days (or such other time as the Parties hereto shall agree in writing) after its engagement, the definitive amounts of the Actual Adjusted EBITDA and/or the Actual Net Debt. Subject to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 3.3.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, the Accounting Expert shall provide the Parties with a written explanation in reasonable detail of the calculation of each of the Actual Adjusted EBITDA and/or the Actual Net Debt, as applicable.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	3.3.7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	If any of the Parties does not agree with the conclusion of the Accounting Expert, the disagreement shall be subject to Arbitration as set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 13.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;below.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S5ECC989D60173EF40B41EC6C4FC002E5">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 3.4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Post-Closing Adjustment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Upon final definition of the Actual Adjusted EBITDA and the Actual Net Debt, pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 3.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;above, the Parties shall proceed as set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit J
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;(&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Post-Closing Adjustment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S8667E64B736544699D9FEC6C4FF10F85">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE 4 &#8211; REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES OF THE COMPANY
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	&#32;&#32;&#32;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Produqu&#237;mica hereby represents and warrants to the Investor, as of the date hereof (or as of such other date as may be expressly provided in any representation or warranty, including
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	) as set forth below. Matters specifically disclosed as part of the Schedules hereto (whether provided therein or expressly incorporated therein by express reference to materials annexed thereto) shall be deemed to be properly disclosed.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S58CCDDB0AD6A737D7938EC6C501209F3">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 4.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Organization, Power and Authority
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Produqu&#237;mica and each of its Subsidiaries is duly incorporated and validly existing under the Applicable Laws of its jurisdiction of incorporation and has the requisite corporate power and authority to carry on its respective business as currently conducted. Produqu&#237;mica has the requisite corporate power and authority to execute and deliver this Agreement and to perform its respective obligations hereunder. The execution, delivery and performance of this Agreement
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	25
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage111"></A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	and the transactions contemplated hereby have been duly and validly authorized by all requisite corporate action on the part of Produqu&#237;mica.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S471373A3FC027F9AFEF2EC6C50433CB3">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 4.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Enforceability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. This Agreement has been duly and validly executed and delivered by Produqu&#237;mica and constitutes a valid and binding agreement of Produqu&#237;mica in Brazil enforceable against Produqu&#237;mica and, to the extent applicable to its Subsidiaries, in accordance with its terms, subject to bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, moratorium and other similar Applicable Laws that affect creditors&#8217; rights generally.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_SDD168F019860AB6662DEEC6C50646712">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 4.3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	No Violation or Breach
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Neither the execution or delivery of this Agreement nor the consummation of the transactions and performance of the terms and conditions of this Agreement by Produqu&#237;mica shall (i)&#160;result in a violation or breach of or default under any provision of the by-laws of Produqu&#237;mica and/or any of its Subsidiaries; (ii) violate, conflict with, result in the breach of, constitute a default under, be prohibited by, require any additional approval under, accelerate the performance provided by, require the assumption of, give any third party the right to terminate, or result in (a) the creation of any Lien upon any of the properties or assets of Produqu&#237;mica and/or its Subsidiaries or (b) any other change in right or obligation or the loss of a benefit under any term, condition or provision of any Material Contract to which Produqu&#237;mica and/or its Subsidiaries are now a party, except as set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.7.1(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	; or (iii) violate any Applicable Law by which the Company and/or any of its Subsidiaries may be bound or affected, except in the case of clauses (ii) and (iii), to the extent that such violation does not impair or delay the ability of Produqu&#237;mica to perform its obligations hereunder.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S5C6256506D7FEDB26B1DEC6C5096B247">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 4.4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Consents
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. No filing or registration with, declaration or notification to, or order, authorization, consent or approval of, any Governmental Authority is required in connection with the execution and delivery of this Agreement by Produqu&#237;mica.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S9E1D97A8CA8FAB13F7E8EC6C50B832AA">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 4.5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Capitalization of the Company and Subsidiaries
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. On the date hereof, all of the outstanding capital stock of the Company has been duly authorized, validly issued and is fully paid and is divided between the Company&#8217;s shareholders as described in Exhibit (i). On the Closing Date, except as set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.5(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, all of the outstanding capital stock of the Company will be duly authorized, validly issued and fully paid and divided between the Company&#8217;s shareholders as described in Exhibit (i). Except as set forth in this Agreement and, as of the Closing Date, except as set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.5(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, there are and there will be on the Closing Date no outstanding or authorized options, warrants, purchase rights, subscription rights, conversion rights,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	advance for future capital increase (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	adiantamento para futuro aumento de capital
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	), exchange rights or other contracts or commitments that could require Initial Shareholders or the Company to sell, transfer or otherwise dispose of any shares of capital stock of the Company and/or from its Subsidiaries
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	26
</FONT>
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage112"></A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	or that could require the Company and/or its Subsidiaries to issue or sell or otherwise cause to become outstanding any of their own capital stock. Except for the Original Shareholders&#8217; Agreement, there are no voting agreements or understandings with respect to the voting of any capital stock of the Company or any of its Subsidiaries or any contracts or commitments that could require the Company and/or its Subsidiaries to enter into any voting agreements or understandings with respect to the voting of any capital stock of Company and/or its Subsidiaries. The shareholders agreement related to the Company executed on October 29, 2007 by Gerhard, Marcelino and Fundo Artesia S&#233;rie Azul de Investimentos em Participa&#231;&#245;es and their successors and authorized assignees, if any, has been terminated prior to the date hereof, and except for the Original Shareholders&#8217; Agreement there is no other shareholders agreement executed by the Original Shareholders and/or otherwise involving the Company&#8217;s shares filed at the Company headquarters.

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 4.6.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Subsidiaries and Branches
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. The Company does not Control, own or hold any equity or other ownership interest in any other Person, except as listed on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.6(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	(&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Subsidiaries
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;). All outstanding capital stock of the Company&#8217;s Subsidiaries have been duly authorized, validly issued, fully paid and are divided between the shareholders or quotaholders, as applicable, as described in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.6(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. The Company&#8217;s operating and non-operating branches are those listed under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.6(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 4.7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Material Contracts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	4.7.1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule&#160;4.7.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;sets out a complete list of the material contracts which (i) Produqu&#237;mica and/or its Subsidiaries are a party to; and (ii) fall into one of the following categories (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Material Contracts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;):
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	any Contract (i) involving annual payments or sales of more than five hundred thousand Reais (R$ 500,000.00), or (ii) that has a remaining term of more than 12 months from the date hereof that cannot be terminated without penalty on less than ninety (90) days&#8217; notice and that involves annual payments of more than two hundred fifty thousand Reais (R$ 250,000.00);
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	any (i) loan agreement, debenture, bonds, mortgages, note and any other agreement and instrument relating to the borrowing of money or obtaining credit pursuant to which the Company and/or any of its Subsidiaries is an obligor (including as guarantor) or oblige, including but not limited to the Financing Agreements; (ii) obligations under foreign exchange contract, currency swap agreement or other similar agreement and any agreement on interest rate (i.e., hedge, protection, option, future, swap, cap, collar or otherwise) or other similar agreement; and (iii) leases that are capitalized in accordance with IFRS, all of which are listed in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.7.1(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	;
</FONT>
</DIV>

	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	any Contract that contains any provision requiring prior consent of the other party for the assignment of such agreement; or any Contract that grants a &#8220;right of first refusal&#8221;, &#8220;right of first offer&#8221;; or other preemptive right with respect to any property or asset of the Company and/or any of its Subsidiaries; or that contains any &#8220;change in control&#8221; or &#8220;anti-assignment&#8221; or &#8220;change on corporate structure&#8221; provision;
</FONT>

	each Material Contract is in full force and effect and is valid, binding and enforceable in accordance with its terms; and
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">

	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	no other contract provides a right for the other party thereto to terminate and/or accelerate the obligations of any of the Material Contracts as a result of the consummation of the transactions contemplated hereby or a change in control of the Company.

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 4.8.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Compliance with Laws
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.8.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The Company and its Subsidiaries are in compliance in all material respects with Applicable Laws.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.8.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	To the best Knowledge of the Company, none of Produqu&#237;mica and/or its Subsidiaries or any of their Representatives has made any payment, rebate, payoff, influence payment, kickback or other payment or
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	28

<A NAME="eolPage114"></A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	used or promised to use, directly or indirectly, any funds (regardless of what form, whether in money, property, goods or services) for any unlawful contribution, gift, entertainment or other unlawful payment to a Government Official, including for (i) obtaining favorable treatment for any of the Company and/or its Subsidiaries or to secure Contracts, (ii) paying for favorable treatment for any of the Company and/or its Subsidiaries or to secure Contracts, or (iii) obtaining any Permit, special concessions or any benefit otherwise, for the Company and/or its Subsidiaries or for any already obtained Permit, special concessions or any benefits otherwise.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.8.3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Except as set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.8.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;that followed the limits, terms and conditions provided for by the Applicable Laws, there has been no political donation made by the Company and/or any of its Subsidiaries since 1st January 2010.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.8.4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	To the best Knowledge of the Company, each transaction is and has been for the past five (5) years properly and accurately recorded on the books and records of Company and/or its Subsidiaries, as the case may be, in all material respects, and each document upon such entries in each of the Company&#8217;s and its Subsidiaries&#8217; books and records are materially accurate and complete. Produqu&#237;mica and/or its Subsidiaries have in place a system of internal accounting controls adequate to materially assure that they maintain no off-the-books accounts and that their assets are used only in accordance with their management directives.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.8.5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	To the best Knowledge of the Company, Produqu&#237;mica has conducted its activities in compliance with the applicable competition regulations established by Applicable Laws.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.8.6.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.8.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;sets forth a list describing certain matters under ongoing discussions and negotiations by the Company and its Subsidiaries with the applicable Governmental Authorities.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.8.7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;To the best of Produquimica&#8217;s Knowledge, the Company has not sold to or engaged with any known terrorists.

<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S182302ACE383198BD645EC6C51B1D1E6">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 4.9.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Labor Matters
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.9.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The Company and/or its Subsidiaries are in compliance in all material respects with the Applicable Laws regarding employment practices, terms and conditions of employment, payroll Taxes, occupational safety and health requirements, wages and work-hours and collective bargaining agreements applicable to the Personnel. Produqu&#237;mica and/or its Subsidiaries are in compliance with all of their material contractual and legal obligations with respect to their service providers and independent contractors, and to the Knowledge of Produqu&#237;mica, there is no threatened proceeding against, any of the Produqu&#237;mica and/or its Subsidiaries
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	29
</FONT>
</DIV>

<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage115"></A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	involving such service providers and independent contractors. There are no employees of the Company which would be entitled to severance payments in the event of dismissal or resignations beyond the severance rights provided for by the Brazilian labour law.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	There is no labor strike, slowdown, lock-out or work stoppage pending, or to the best of Produqu&#237;mica&#8217;s Knowledge, threatened, against or affecting the Company and/or its Subsidiaries, and except as described in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.9.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;none of the foregoing has occurred in the last five (5) years.

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;presents a complete list of the Personnel, as of the date set forth on such Schedule, including their current positions, compensation and employment agreement status of each Personnel. No labor agreement executed between the Company and/or its Subsidiaries and each of its Personnel has any provision related to Company&#8217;s change of control. In addition,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.10(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;sets forth a complete list of the collective bargaining agreements or similar agreements with any union, council or similar body that is binding on the Company and is not delinquent in payments to any of its employees for any wages, salaries, commissions, bonuses or other direct compensation for any services performed on the date hereof.

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.11.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The Company and each of its Subsidiaries holds all federal, state, local and foreign permits, licenses, authorizations, approvals, registrations and certifications to conduct of the business as currently conducted by Produqu&#237;mica and each of its Subsidiaries except in each case, as it would not cause a material adverse effect to the Company and/or the Investor (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Permits
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;), and (i) each such Permits are in full force and effect and Produqu&#237;mica and each of its Subsidiaries is, on the date hereof, in compliance with the material obligations with respect thereto other than where noncompliance would not individually or in the aggregate reasonably be expected to cause a material adverse effect to the Company and/or the Investor; (ii) Produqu&#237;mica and/or any of its and each of its Subsidiaries has not received written notice that it is in material default or violation of any such Permits and, to the best of Produqu&#237;mica&#8217;s Knowledge, there are no grounds for the revocation of any such Permits; and (iii) the applications required to have been filed for the renewal of such Permits have been timely filed (after giving effect to any grace periods and extensions) with the appropriate Governmental Authority.
</FONT>
</DIV>

	: (i) there are no pending, or to the best of Produqu&#237;mica&#8217;s Knowledge threatened, Environmental Claims arising out of any Applicable Laws against the Company and/or its Subsidiaries; (ii)&#160;the Company and/or its Subsidiaries are in compliance in all material aspects with the Applicable Laws applicable to the operation of the business as currently conducted, (iii) to the best of Produqu&#237;mica&#8217;s Knowledge there is no Environmental damage (

	dano ambiental

	Schedule 4.13
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Except as listed on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.14
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, (i) neither the Company nor and/or any of its Subsidiaries have received any written notice that remains uncured alleging that the conduct of Produqu&#237;mica and/or any of its Subsidiaries is in violation of any Applicable Laws relating to Taxes and there are no Claims pending against Produqu&#237;mica and/or any of its Subsidiaries initiated by any Tax Governmental Authority; (ii) the Tax Returns required to be filed by Produqu&#237;mica and/or any of its Subsidiaries have been timely filed with the appropriate Tax Governmental Authorities and such fillings are materially complete and correct; (iii) Produqu&#237;mica and/or its Subsidiaries have complied in all material aspects with the Applicable Laws relating to Taxes and is currently up to date with the filling of the applicable Tax Returns and with the payment of Taxes or has entered adequate provisions or recorded sufficient accrued Liabilities according to IFRS; (iv) to the best of Produqu&#237;mica&#8217;s Knowledge, the Tax documentation and records of its own and of its Subsidiaries have been duly recorded and are available and maintained for the required minimum retention period; (v) the Company and/or its Subsidiaries have not entered into any agreement or settlement with any Governmental Authorities or obtained any Tax relief, concession or tolerance that may cease or be modified as a result of the present Transaction and other covenants herein.
</FONT>
</DIV>

</FONT>

The consummation of the Closing does not reduce or terminate any of the Tax incentives, benefits and installment programs disclosed in

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 4.15.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Insurance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule&#160;4.15
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;lists the material insurance policies of the Company and its Subsidiaries other than policies relating to employee benefit plans (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Insurance Policies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;), identifying the name of the insurance carrier, the nature of the insured risks, the amount of the coverage (including the amount of any deductible thereunder) and the duration of the Insurance Policy. To the best of Produqu&#237;mica&#8217;s Knowledge (i) such Insurance Policies are in full force and effect and will continue in full force and effect following the Closing in accordance with their terms; (ii) the premiums due with respect to such Insurance Policies have been timely paid; and (iii) no written notice of cancellation or termination or intent to cancel has been received by Produqu&#237;mica and/or any of its Subsidiaries with respect to any such Insurance Policy; and (iii) except for any claim which term for notification has not expired as of the date hereof, the Company and/or its Subsidiaries have given notice to the insurer of all claims that have arisen in the last twelve (12) months and for which the Company has decided to request for indemnification by the relevant insurer.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">

	Section 4.16.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Assets
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.16.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Except as set forth on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.16.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, as of the date hereof, Produqu&#237;mica and/or its Subsidiaries are the legal owner, or otherwise the holder of a legal right to use, with no violation of third party rights, the assets and properties used for the conduct of the business, in the manner currently used, free and clear of Liens.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.16.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The assets and properties used in connection with the business are in their material respects in reasonable condition of use, maintenance and repair, subject to ordinary wear and tear, and are sufficient for the conduct of the business as currently conducted by Produqu&#237;mica and/or its Subsidiaries.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_SE7D26C0EE4D74ED52800EC6C52AF8358">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 4.17.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Real Property
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.17.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	As listed in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.17.1(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, on the date hereof, Produqu&#237;mica and/or its Subsidiary have legal right to possess and/or own good and marketable title over the Real Property used in connection with the business, and except as listed in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.17.1(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, such Real Property is held free and clear of any Lien. Except as set forth on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.11.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;the Company and/or its Subsidiaries hold valid Permits applicable to the Real Property that are required for the operation of the businesses as currently conducted.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	There is no pending or, to best of Produqu&#237;mica&#8217;s Knowledge, threatened, action or proceeding before any Governmental Authority affecting any of the Real Property that would reasonably be expected to interfere in any material respect with the use or occupancy of any Real Property or any portion thereof in the operation of the business as currently conducted. There is no written notice of breach in connection with the Contracts related to the Leased Real Property that remains uncured.
</FONT>
</DIV>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:104PX;">
	Section 4.18.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Intellectual Property
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.18.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.18.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;sets forth a list of the Intellectual Property which, as of the date hereof, is owned or licensed by or to Produqu&#237;mica and/or its Subsidiaries (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Registered IP
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;), free and clear of Liens. There is no other Intellectual Property other than the Registered IP (i) owned or licensed by or to Produqu&#237;mica and/or its Subsidiaries or (ii) necessary and/or required to Produqu&#237;mica and/or its Subsidiaries to conduct their business activities as currently conducted.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.18.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Except as set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.18.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, the Company and its Subsidiaries have not (i) received any written notice that any Registered IP is currently the subject of any reexamination, opposition, cancellation or invalidation proceeding before any Governmental Authority and, to the best of Produqu&#237;mica&#8217;s Knowledge, no such proceeding is threatened, (ii) made any Claim or requested any opposition, cancellation or invalidation, regarding a Registered IP against any third party. The material application, registration, maintenance and renewal fees have been paid to, and the documents and certificates necessary for the purposes of maintaining any Registered IP have been filed with the applicable Governmental Authority.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.18.3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	To the best Knowledge of the Company, neither Produqu&#237;mica nor any of its Subsidiaries has taken any action that constitutes any infringement, misappropriation or violation of any Intellectual Property right of any third party. To the best of Produqu&#237;mica&#8217;s Knowledge, no third party has interfered with, infringed upon, misappropriated or violated any Registered IP.
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 4.19.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Financial Statements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.19.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The Financial Statements (including the notes thereto), as listed in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, present in all material respects the financial condition of the Company and Fermavi as of the dates set forth therein, in conformity with the IFRS, applied in a consistent manner.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.19.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	To the best of Produqu&#237;mica&#8217;s Knowledge (i) the accounting books accurately reflect the transactions of the Company and/or its Subsidiaries in all material respects and (ii) there are in place policies and procedures with respect to financial reporting that are sufficient to provide reasonable assurances that transactions are recorded as necessary to permit preparation of its Financial Statements, in accordance with applicable IFRS, and (iii) the Financial Statements have been prepared according to the books and records of the Company and Fermavi and present fairly, in a true and complete manner, the operating results, statements of income, statements of retained earnings, changes in stockholders' equity and cash flows of the Company (on a consolidated basis) and Fermavi on the dates and for the periods to which they refer, in conformity with IFRS, applied in a consistent manner during the periods in question. To the best of Produqu&#237;mica&#8217;s Knowledge, neither the Company nor any of its Subsidiaries have received or otherwise obtained knowledge of any complaint or allegation regarding the accounting or auditing practices, policies or procedures or its respective internal accounting controls. All Indebtedness of the Company and/or its Subsidiaries is accrued for in their accounting books and records, and there are no off-the-book transactions.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	4.19.3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	None of the Company and/or any of its Subsidiaries have (a) guaranteed any Indebtedness or otherwise incurred any Liability or obligation for the benefit of any of the Initial Shareholders and any of its Affiliates that is not registered in the Financial Statements; (b) sold, leased, transferred, licensed, encumbered or disposed of any of its properties or assets (excluding marketable securities) in any transaction involving any of the Initial Shareholders and any of its Affiliates, or (c) agreed or otherwise committed to take any of the foregoing actions. To the best Knowledge of the Company, all notes and accounts for receivables of Company and its Subsidiaries are properly registered in their books and records, are valid and not subject to any impediment or counterclaim, are current and collectible, and shall be collected according to the terms thereof in the respective values recorded, in accordance with the past practices of Company and its Subsidiaries. All accounts for receivables of the Company and/or its Subsidiaries (x) result from materially accurate and lawful transactions, as set forth in IFRS in the respective financial statements and corresponding notes; and (y) represent or will represent valid obligations arising from sales actually made or services actually performed according to past practice of the Company and/or its Subsidiaries.
</FONT>
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, (i)&#160;there is no Claim brought by any third party against Produqu&#237;mica and/or its Subsidiaries or pending before any Governmental Authority or arbitrator nor, to the best of Produqu&#237;mica&#8217;s Knowledge, is any such Claim threatened and no event has occurred or circumstance exists that could reasonably give rise to any Claim that could cause a material adverse effect to the Company, its Subsidiaries and Shareholders, (ii) Produqu&#237;mica and/or its Subsidiaries have not brought any Claims against any third party; and (iii) there is no audit, investigation or inspection, either internal or external (each, an &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Investigation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;) of Produqu&#237;mica and/or its Subsidiaries, nor, to the best of Produqu&#237;mica&#8217;s Knowledge, is any such Investigation threatened.
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 4.21.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

</FONT>

	, there is no investment banker, broker, legal advisor or finder which has been retained by or is authorized to act on behalf of the Company who is or might be entitled to any fees, commission or payment from the Company in connection with the negotiation, preparation, execution or delivery of this Agreement or the consummation of the Transaction contemplated hereby.
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 4.22.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Except as provided in this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Article 4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, neither Produqu&#237;mica, nor any of its respective Affiliates, nor any of their respective Representatives has made, or is making, any other representation or warranty whatsoever, to Investor, its Affiliates or their respective Representatives. No such Person shall be liable in respect of the accuracy or completeness of any information, including information contained in any electronic data room in connection with the transactions contemplated by this Agreement, provided to Investor, its Affiliates or its respective Representatives other than expressly represented or warranted to Investor in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Article 4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 4.23.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Solvency
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Except as listed in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 4.20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, no order has been delivered to the Company, nor any petition served to the Company applying for liquidation, bankruptcy or reorganization (judicial or not) of Produqu&#237;mica and/or their Subsidiaries. There is no third party petition served to the Company for bankruptcy of the Company and/or its Subsidiaries that was not timely defended and/or guaranteed by a court bond (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	dep&#243;sito judicial
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	) or other guarantee required by the applicable court. No action has been taken to appoint a court administrator or trustee for any part of the assets of the Company and/or its Subsidiaries. Produqu&#237;mica and/or its Subsidiaries have not made or proposed any arrangement or other form of general agreement or solicitation with their creditors or any class of creditors.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S00BBCB6E48FEFBF4B6EBEC6C53D844A6">
