<A NAME="eolPage126"></A>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S47DFC76452711FF4FE27EC6C56E88F1F">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 7.4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Hedge
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Until no later than January 1, 2016, the Company shall hedge (by swap and/or other derivative agreement) any debt due by the Company and/or any of its Subsidiaries which exposes the Company and/or any of its Subsidiaries to any currency other than Reais. To the extent possible and cost efficient, the Company will endeavor its best efforts to pre-pay the US Dollar denominated debt.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_SAF8D29187A85E723503AEC6C5719EF23">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 7.5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Jacare&#237; Lease Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Until no later than January 1, 2016, the Company shall amend the lease agreement (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Contrato de Loca&#231;&#227;o Comercial
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	) executed on August 31, 2012 between the Company and Rio Parate&#237; Empreendimentos e Participa&#231;&#245;es S.A., as amended on October 15, 2012, in order to extend its term until August 31, 2032. Such extension shall contain the same material terms, including the lease rate.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S8A4B2C12A73DEB05E146EC6C573BE8B2">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:93PX;">
	Section 7.6.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Assumption of Credit Risk under Credito Rural
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. For the benefit of the Company and the Investor, the Majority Block Shareholders will issue a joint and several guarantee attached as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 7.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;with respect to the payment of the Company&#8217;s guarantee obligations under Credito Rural, as described in such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 7.6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S458704B325A8E138F5F0EC6C578E9610">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE 8: INDEMNIFICATION
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Section 8.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Indemnification by the Company.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	8.1.1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;After Closing, subject to the terms of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Article 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, the Company shall indemnify and hold harmless the Investor, its Affiliates, its officers and directors (each such Person, a &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Investor Indemnified Party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; and, collectively, the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Investor Indemnified Parties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;) from and against Losses incurred by any Investor Indemnified Party resulting from or arising out of (i) any breach of any representation or warranty made by Initial Shareholders and/or the Company pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Articles 4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;above, and/or (ii) any non-disclosed matter in connection with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Articles 4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;above that causes a given representation and warranty not to be true complete and correct; and/or (iii) any breach or non-performance of any covenants and/or obligations undertaken by the Company and/or the Initial Shareholders under this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	8.1.1.1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;For the avoidance of doubt, the Parties hereby agree that the Company&#180;s indemnification obligation set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 8.1.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;shall not include (i) any Losses resulting from acts or events that occur after the Closing Date; and/or (ii) any Losses resulting from acts or facts that are prior to the Closing Date, if the cause or source directly related to such Loss was expressly and specifically indicated in any Schedule or Exhibit hereto.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	41
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage127"></A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	8.1.1.1(a) The Parties hereby agree that (i) the information contained in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Schedule 6.7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;that is not specifically listed in any other Schedule hereto and (ii) the matters listed in Schedule 8.1.1.1(a), both shall not exclude the Company&#8217;s indemnification obligation set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 8.1.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	8.1.1.1(b) The Parties hereby agree that, from the Closing Date and until the date of the exercise of the Exit Put Option or the Exit Call Option, as the case may be, in the event a Loss exceeding the amount of twenty five thousand reais (R$ 25.000,00) annually adjusted by the IGP-M, is suffered by the Company as determined in a definitive Governmental Order directly resulting from a matter listed in Schedule 8.1.1.1(a), the Investor shall be deemed to have indirectly incurred in such Loss. Therefore, the Company shall indemnify the Investor for such indirectly incurred Loss, in proportion to the equity interest held by the Investor in the Company after the Post-Closing Adjustment, by applying the formula set forth in Section 8.13. The corresponding amount of such Loss shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	not
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;be subject to the Deductible set forth in Section 8.5.1.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	8.1.1.1(c) The Parties also hereby agree that, after the date of the exercise of the Exit Put Option or the Exit Call Option, as the case may be, in the event a Loss is suffered by the Company as determined in a definitive Governmental Order directly resulting from a matter listed in Schedule 8.1.1.1(a), the corresponding amount of such Loss shall be included in the Second Deductible set forth in Section 11.2. and the provisions of Article 11 shall be followed.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	8.1.1.1(d) The Parties further agree that reasonable costs and expenses incurred by the Company on the procedures to obtain the issuance and/or renewal of the Permits listed in Schedule 8.1.1.1(a) or defending a Claim related to the matters listed in Schedule 8.1.1.1(a) (including reasonable attorneys&#8217; and advisors&#8217; fees), shall not be considered as part of the relevant Loss and therefore shall not be subject to indemnification as per 8.1.1.1(b).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	8.1.1.1(e) A Loss suffered by the Company as determined in a definitive Governmental Order directly resulting from the REFIS Law n. 13.043/2014 (conversion of Provisional Measure 651/2014), as listed in Schedule 8.1.1.1(a), shall only be considered for indemnification under the terms of Section 8.1.1.1(a) for amounts that exceed six million, two hundred forty-seven thousand, five hundred sixty-six Reais and ninety cents (R$ 6.247.566,90), as of November 30, 2014, adjusted by the interest rate of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Sistema Especial de Liquida&#231;&#227;o e de Cust&#243;dia (Selic).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	8.1.1.2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Effect of Knowledge qualification
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. The Company&#180;s indemnification obligation set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 8.1.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;shall not be affected by any &#8220;Knowledge&#8221; qualification made to the representations and warranties, by or in relation to Company and/or its Subsidiaries and/or Initial Shareholder, and such &#8220;Knowledge&#8221;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	42
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage128"></A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	qualification shall not, in any event, be interpreted as a way to prevent an indemnification of an Investor Indemnified Party under the terms of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S21A58FB71C60C47E51A1EC6C57C0C4D4">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 8.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Indemnification by Investor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Subject to the terms of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Article 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, Investor shall indemnify and hold harmless each of the Initial Shareholders, their Affiliates, their officers and directors and their successors and assignees, including the Company (each, a &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Initial Shareholders Indemnified Party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; and, collectively, the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Initial Shareholders Indemnified Parties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;) from and against Losses incurred by any Initial Shareholders Indemnified Party resulting from or arising out of (i)&#160;any breach of any representation or warranty made by Investor pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Article 6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;above; and/or (ii)&#160;any breach or non-performance of any covenants and/or obligations of Investor under this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S6FE3E1D6926DAFDC34E4EC6C57E38B37">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 8.3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Term of Indemnification
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. The obligation to indemnify pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 8.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;and 8.2 an Investor Indemnified Party or an Initial Shareholders Indemnified Party, respectively (each an &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Indemnified Party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;) shall be limited and valid for a period of five (5) years counted as from the Closing Date, provided that if a Third-Party Claim of the Company, Third-Party Claim Received by Indemnified Party and/or Direct Claim is validly notified pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sections 8.9
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	8.10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	8.11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;within such five (5) year period, then the indemnification obligations set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 8.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	8.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;regarding exclusively such Third-Party Claim of the Company, Third-Party Claim Received by Indemnified Party and/or Direct Claim shall remain in force until the final settlement of such Third-Party Claim of the Company, Third-Party Claim Received by Indemnified Party and/or Direct Claim (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Indemnification Period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S0AED477296947C953851EC6C58137D2E">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 8.4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Indemnifiable Loss
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Subject to the other provisions of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Article 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, a Loss incurred by an Indemnified Party subject to the indemnification obligations set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 8.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	8.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;will only be considered an indemnifiable Loss if it is notified within the Indemnification Period (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Indemnifiable Loss
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_SE6F51DC524F009E47556EC6C5835482D">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 8.5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Deductible and Maximum Amount of Indemnification
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	8.5.1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Deductible
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The Company shall only be deemed liable when the total amount of the Indemnifiable Losses reaches the amount of twenty million Reais (R$&#160;20,000,000), annually adjusted by the IGP-M (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Deductible
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;). Until the Deductible amount is exceeded, (i) the Company and/or its Subsidiaries, as applicable, shall be solely responsible for any Indemnifiable Losses incurred by the Company and/or any of its Subsidiaries, and (ii) the Company shall not be obligated to pay any indemnification to any Investor Indemnified Party. Therefore, the Company shall indemnify the Investor Indemnified Parties only for the amount of their aggregate Indemnifiable Losses which exceeds the Deductible.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	43
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage129"></A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	8.5.2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Maximum Amount of Indemnification
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Notwithstanding the foregoing, the maximum amount of Indemnifiable Losses that will be considered for the calculation of any indemnification payment to any Investor Indemnified Parties or the Initial Shareholders Indemnified Parties, pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 8.13
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	below, as the case may be, by virtue of the obligations to indemnify contained in this Agreement shall be limited to, in the aggregate, one hundred fifty million Reais (R$&#160;150,000,000), annually adjusted by the IGP-M.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S738497AEE26ADF1ECF3EEC6C58672B09">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 8.6.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Insurance; Tax Benefits; Subrogation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. The amount of any Indemnifiable Loss shall be reduced by: (i) any insurance indemnities actually paid to the Company, the Investor Indemnified Parties or the Initial Shareholders Indemnified Parties, as the case may be, relating to the respective Indemnifiable Loss; and/or (ii) indemnities, contributions or other payments actually paid to the Company, the Investor Indemnified Parties or the Initial Shareholders Indemnified Parties, as the case may be, by third parties by virtue of such Indemnifiable Loss.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S5D2F7233E487B13ECAD4EC6C588989E7">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 8.7.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Memorandum Account.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;For purposes of recording any Indemnifiable Losses and the amount of any ongoing Third-Party Claim of the Company, Third-Party Claims Received by Indemnified Party and Direct Claims subject to the Company&#8217;s obligation to indemnify the Investor Indemnified Parties under this Agreement, the Parties agree to a memorandum account (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	conta gr&#225;fica
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	) (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Memorandum Account
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;) to be created and maintained by the Company separately from its regular accounting books and records. On a quarterly basis, up to thirty (30) days after the end of each quarter, the Parties agree that the Company will submit to the Parties a summary of the Memorandum Account, informing the amounts recorded in the immediately preceding quarter according to this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Article 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;and the overall balance of the Memorandum Account. For the avoidance of doubt, only after the aggregate Indemnifiable Losses sum up to the Deductible amount, any indemnification due by the Company shall be paid in accordance with this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Article 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S4D5A6792DF5181E44134EC6C58BB94BB">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 8.8.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exclusive Remedy
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Without prejudice of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 13.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, the Parties expressly agree that, except in cases of fraud or willful misconduct, their sole and exclusive monetary remedy (including equitable remedies that involve monetary payment, such as restitution or disgorgement, other than specific performance to enforce any payment or performance due hereunder) for any breach of any representation and warranty or breach of or default in connection with any of the covenants or agreements contained in this Agreement or any instrument contemplated herein, shall be the indemnification provisions of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Article 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;and that, the Initial Shareholders and the Company shall not have other obligations to indemnify the Investor Indemnified Parties, under Brazilian law, including on the basis of non-contractual liability (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	responsabilidade extra-contratual
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S609491A704BFC61E8422EC6C58DC521E">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 8.9.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Losses Resulting from a Direct Claim
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. In the event any of the Indemnified Parties incur in an Indemnifiable Loss that does not involve a Third-Party Claim of the Company or a Third-Party Claim
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	44
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage130"></A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Received by Indemnified Party, such Indemnified Party shall send a written notice to the Indemnifying Party (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Direct Claim
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;) within twenty (20) Business Days after such Indemnified Party incurs the Indemnifiable Loss (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Notice of Direct Claim
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;). The Notice of Direct Claim shall describe the Direct Claim and the circumstances, events, facts, obligations, claims, documents, information or matters giving rise to the Direct Claim, the amount of the Indemnifiable Loss, the method of calculation thereof, and shall also contain a reference to the provisions of this Agreement pursuant to which such right of indemnification arises or is claimed, to the extent the Indemnified Party holds such information. The Indemnified Party&#8217;s failure to send a Notice of Direct Claim in the timing set forth herein shall exempt the Indemnifying Party from the indemnification obligation set forth in this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Article 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.9.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Should the Indemnifying Party expressly agree to be liable for the payment of the Indemnifiable Loss in question, the Indemnifying Party shall pay to the Indemnified Party the Indemnifiable Loss, as set forth in this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Article 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.9.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Should the Indemnifying Party inform, in its response, that it is not liable for the claimed Indemnifiable Loss or that it does not agree with the amount of the Indemnifiable Loss presented in the Notice of Direct Claim, the Parties shall meet within&#160;the&#160;five (5) subsequent Business Days to try to reach an agreement in good faith about such Direct Claim. If the Parties fail to reach an agreement on amicable terms about the Party that should bear such Indemnifiable Loss, the Indemnified Party may commence an arbitration procedure, pursuant to&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 13.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#160;below.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S7E00CF09BB9983538E0CEC6C590DF8A5">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 8.10.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Third-Party Claim against an Indemnified Party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. If an Indemnified Party receives notice of any Claim from any third party, including Governmental Authorities (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Third Party Claim Received by Indemnified Party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;) which may give rise to a Claim for an Indemnifiable Loss, the Parties, as the case may be, shall observe the terms and conditions of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 8.10
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.10.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. The Indemnified Party shall send a written notice of such Third-Party Claim Received by Indemnified Party to the Company, Initial Shareholders or Investor, as applicable pursuant to this Agreement (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Indemnifying Party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;), with a copy of the relevant documentation, no later than the earlier of (i) the date on which one third (1/3) of the respective defense period has elapsed and (ii) 5 (five) Business Days after the Indemnified Party itself received notice of such Third-Party Claim Received by Indemnified Party (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Notice of Third-Party Claim
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;). The Notice of Third-Party Claim shall describe the Third-Party Claim Received by Indemnified Party and the circumstances, events, facts, obligations, claims, documents, information or matters giving rise to the Third-Party Claim Received by Indemnified Party, the probable amount in case of a Loss, if known, or the method of calculation thereof, and shall also contain a reference to the provisions of this Agreement pursuant to which such right of indemnification arises or is claimed. The
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	45
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage131"></A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Indemnified Party&#8217;s failure to notify the Indemnifying Party within the period set forth herein shall not exempt or wave the Indemnifying Party from the obligation to make payment for the respective indemnification, except to the extent that the Indemnifying Party&#8217;s ability to defend the relevant Third-Party Claim Received by Indemnified Party is significantly impaired by such delay.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.10.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The Indemnifying Party shall be entitled to assume and control the defense of such Third-Party Claim Received by Indemnified Party through counsel of its choice, which shall report to the Indemnifying Party, as long as it notifies the Indemnified Party of such intention within 5 (five) Business Days of the receipt of the Notice of Third-Party Claim (or sooner, and always before one-third (1/3) of the legal period available for defense). Both Parties shall fully cooperate with each other (i) in choosing the counsel that will be in charge of the defense of the Third Party Claim within the periods mentioned in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Sections 8.10.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	8.10.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, and (ii) in any defense of a Third Party Claim Received by Indemnified Party, and make available, at the Indemnifying Party&#8217;s expense, all witnesses, records, materials and information in its possession or under its control that relates to the respective Third Party Claim Received by Indemnified Party, as reasonably required by the Indemnifying Party. During the conduction of the relevant Third Party Claim, both Parties shall mutually agree in keeping or replacing the counsel primarily chosen if reasonably justified by each Party.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.10.3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	If the Indemnifying Party has failed to respond to the Notice of Third-Party Claim, the Indemnified Party shall appoint and hire the responsible counsel for the conduct of such defense, response or other measure, provided that the Indemnifying Party may be held liable for the Indemnifiable Loss resulting from Third Party Claim Received by Indemnified Party upon final resolution of the Third Party Claim Received by Indemnified Party, in accordance with this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Article 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, as the case may be.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.10.4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The Party conducting the defense shall always, in light of a Third Party Claim Received by Indemnified Party, have the opportunity to propose a settlement in relation of such claims, provided that the Indemnified Party may not enter into any settlement without the prior written consent of the Indemnifying Party. The Indemnifying Party may enter into any settlement without the prior written consent of the Indemnified Party.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S608DA83100099ACDE287EC6C592F64A0">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 8.11.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Third-Party Claim against the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. In the event any Claim from any third party is filed against the Company and/or any of its Subsidiaries that could result in an Indemnifiable Loss for any Investor Indemnified Party (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Third Party Claim of the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;), the Company shall record the amount and the description of the relevant Third-Party Claim of the Company in the Memorandum Account. The Company shall support the defense costs of such Third-Party Claim of the Company, including but not limited to, attorney&#8217;s fees and other fees such as expert appraisal, interest, penalties, monetary correction, guarantees
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	46
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage132"></A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	(i.e., security, bond or deposit), and in the event the Third-Party Claim of the Company is decided against the Company and/or any of its Subsidiaries, all such expenses shall be considered as included in the total amount of the Indemnifiable Loss and shall be recorded in the Memorandum Account.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:1PX;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.11.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Defense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. The Company shall undertake, defend, conduct and control (through counsel of its own choosing and at its own expense) for and on behalf of the Indemnified Party in a diligent manner, and, in any event, shall have the right to participate (at its own expense) in, the settlement or defense of such Third-Party Claim of the Company, and the Indemnified Party shall cooperate with it in connection therewith by timely providing the information and documents relevant and reasonably requested by the Company and that are under the control of the Indemnified Party, including granting the powers of attorney necessary to prepare the defense and the supply to the Company of records and information that may be reasonably relevant for such defense, making employees available, including to act as witnesses or attorney-in-fact in connection with such Third-Party Claim of the Company. The Company shall maintain the Indemnified Party and the Initial Shareholders informed regarding the defense as long as the Third-Party Claim of the Company is ongoing.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.11.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;The Company shall use its best efforts to maintain the Indemnified Party, at all times, free and clear from any restrictions and/or Liens, including in connection with the issuance of Tax clearance certificates of the Indemnified Party. For such purpose, the Company shall take all measures that are under its control, including filling lawsuits, to allow the Indemnified Party to release such restriction and/or Liens or obtain Tax clearance certificates. In the event the Company uses its own resources and/or assets to provide a security, bond or deposit to enable the release of a restriction and/or Liens or obtain Tax clearance certificates, whenever such security, bond or deposit is released, the amounts or assets thereto related shall be returned to the Company in full and, if made in cash it shall be monetarily adjusted on the same terms applicable to the security, bond or deposit.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
	8.11.3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Settlement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Until the Exit Put Option or Exit Call Option is exercised, the Company shall be allowed to settle any Third-Party Claim of the Company, provided that such settlement is in the best interest of the Company and the prior written approval of the Investor is obtained. Such written approval shall not be unreasonably withheld or delayed in a manner to violate any fiduciary duty of the Investor as a shareholder of the Company. After the Exit Put Option or Exit Call Option is exercised, the Company is not allowed to settle any Third-Party Claim of the Company, provided that such settlement is in the best interest of the Company and the prior written approval of the Initial Shareholders is obtained. Such written approval shall be not be unreasonably withheld or delayed in a manner to violate any fiduciary duty of the Initial Shareholders as former shareholders of the Company.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	47
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage133"></A>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_SD7BAFEBF9C7952AA8BC2EC6C5961B68C">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 8.12.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Maturity of an Indemnifiable Loss
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. An Indemnifiable Loss shall only be due by the Company or the Investor, as the case may be, if the Indemnifiable Loss is subject to: (i) an enforceable and final judicial or arbitral decision issued in relation to the relevant Third-Party Claim of the Company or the Third-Party Claim Received by the Indemnified Party, if applicable; or (ii) a final arbitral award issued in favor of the Indemnified Party in relation to the relevant Direct Claim, if applicable; or (iii) an written agreement between the Indemnified Party, on one side, and the Investor or the Company, as the case may be, on the other side, confirming that such Indemnifiable Loss is due by the Investor or the Company, as applicable.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S7D322B8C3BA70369091DEC6C5985D4DC">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 8.13.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Payment of an Indemnifiable Loss to an Investor Indemnified Party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. With due regards to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Article 11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, in the event of an Indemnifiable Loss suffered by the Company pursuant to this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Article 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;in excess of the Deductible set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 8.5.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, the Investor shall be deemed to have indirectly incurred in such Indemnifiable Loss. Therefore, subject to the other provisions of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Article 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, the Company shall indemnify the Investor for such indirectly incurred Indemnifiable Loss, in proportion to the equity interest held by the Investor in the Company as a result of the Post-Closing Adjustment, by applying the following formula:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Indemnification Value = (Loss amount x Investor&#8217;s equity interest) / (1- Investor&#8217;s equity interest)
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Where:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	- &#8220;Indemnification Value&#8221; means the indemnification amount due by the Company to the Investor as a result of an Indemnifiable Loss incurred by the Company and/or any of its Subsidiaries.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	- &#8220;Investor&#8217;s equity interest&#8221; means the percentage of the total equity of the Company held by the Investor after the Post-Closing Adjustment contemplated in this Agreement and in the Share Purchase Agreement, expressed in decimals.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	-
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8220;Loss amount&#8221; means the amount of the Indemnifiable Loss incurred by the Company and/or its Subsidiaries, expressed in Reais
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	For illustrative purposes, an example of the calculation of the payment of an Indemnifiable Loss suffered by the Company, pursuant to this Article 8, is described in Exhibit K.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S26EC929B69425BBD2CFDEC6C59B52A93">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:104PX;">
	Section 8.14.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Payment of an Indemnifiable Loss to an Initial Shareholders Indemnified Party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Any payment for indemnification of any Indemnifiable Losses to any Initial Shareholders Indemnified Party shall be made by the Investor within thirty (30) Business Days of the receipt by the Investor of a written notice informing that the payment is due pursuant to the terms of this
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Article 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	48
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage134"></A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S23AFA27C5C1707FF09AAEC6C59D8E99C">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 8.15.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Obligation to Mitigate Risks of Loss
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. The Company, its Subsidiaries and/or the Indemnified Party, as the case may be, shall use commercially reasonable efforts to mitigate any chance of effective materialization of any Loss that may be construed as an Indemnifiable Loss.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_SE23FB3DF07F20BDAE84AEC6C5A07C7B8">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE 9 &#8211; EXIT PUT OPTION AND EXIT CALL OPTION
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_S79722764FA116DDBA16DEC6C5A284309">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 9.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exit Put Option and Exit Call Option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. The Parties agree and acknowledge as follows: (i) Investor hereby grants an irrevocable put option right to the Majority Block Shareholders, effective as of the Closing Date, allowing them to jointly sell and deliver to Investor the totality of their shares of the Company in exchange for the Final Exit Option Price (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exit Put Option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;), and (ii) the Majority Block Shareholders hereby grant, jointly and severally, an irrevocable call option right to the Investor, effective as of the Closing Date, allowing Investor or any of its Affiliates to purchase and receive the totality of the shares of the Company held by the Majority Block Shareholders in exchange for the Final Exit Option Price (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exit Call Option
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;). To the extent permitted by Applicable Law, the Parties agree to consider whether the Majority Block Shareholders can sell their shares indirectly through newly incorporated companies, provided that if the Parties cannot agree to the sale in the manner proposed by the Majority Block Shareholders, the Exit Put Option or the Exit Call Option shall be completed directly through the acquisition of the totality of the equity interest of the Majority Block Shareholders. Upon the exercise of the Exit Put Option or the exercise of the Exit Call Option, as the case may be, the Investor (or its relevant Affiliate) shall also acquire all of the remaining shares held by all Selling Shareholders in exchange for a price per share equivalent to the Final Exit Option Price per share, pursuant to the irrevocable commitment to be executed by all Selling Shareholders on the Closing Date in the form of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit L
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	9.1.1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exercise Period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. The Exit Put Option may be exercised by the Majority Block Shareholders, jointly, at any time between October 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:7PT">
	st
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;and October 31
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<SUP STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:7PT">
	st
</SUP>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;of each of the years of 2016, 2017 and 2018. The Exit Put Option shall be exercised by means of the delivery of a written notice by the Majority Block Shareholders to the Investor pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 13.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;below. Investor shall only be entitled to exercise the Exit Call Option between October 1, 2018 and October 31, 2018 and, in such event, the Exit Call Option may be exercised by means of the delivery of a written notice to the Majority Block Shareholders pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 13.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;below. If the Exit Put Option or the Exit Call Option is not exercised within the terms set forth herein, then such Exit Put Option and such Exit Call Option shall be automatically revoked and canceled.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	9.1.2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The exercise of any of the Exit Put Option or the Exit Call Option shall not be conditional on any event. Notwithstanding the foregoing, the transfer of shares of the Company as a result of the exercise of the Exit Put Option or the Exit Call Option, as the case may be, and the payment of the Final Exit Option Price, shall observe the following actions:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	49
</FONT>
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage135"></A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:66PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	no Governmental Order has been issued and/or Applicable Law has been enacted or promulgated by any competent Governmental Authority, or other prohibition shall be in effect (i) questioning the validity and legitimacy of the transfer of the shares; and/or (ii) preventing the consummation of the transfer of the shares; and/or (iii) imposing material restrictions to the operations of the PDQ Business;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:66PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:66PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	all approvals by a Governmental Authority imposed by Applicable Law that are required for the transfer of the shares shall have been obtained, and the Parties hereby undertake to timely take all necessary actions in order to obtain such approvals and not postpone the transfer of the shares in an unreasonable manner;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:66PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:66PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Selling Shareholders shall have caused the Company to (i) take all necessary actions to avoid the breach of any agreement that requires the consent and/or waiver from third parties for the transfer of the shares, including but not limited to those related to change of control or any other type of similar restriction, or (ii) obtain, in writing, and deliver a copy to Investor, of such consent and/or waiver. For the avoidance of doubt, the terms of the applicable agreements where consents and/or waivers are required, shall be observed in their completeness and, if such agreement does not provide for interpretation free of doubt regarding the potential restrictions, then consent and/or waiver in writing shall always be required and delivered to Investor, unless otherwise agreed by the Parties in writing;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:66PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#160;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:66PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the Company or any of the Initial Shareholders are not accused by any Government Authority of violating any Applicable Laws regarding any anti-corruption and/or bribery matters, including but not limited to, the Brazilian law n. 12.846/2013;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:66PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:66PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(e)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the Company shall be, directly or indirectly, the owner and sole beneficiary of one hundred percent (100%) of the equity interest of each of its Subsidiaries, except for Fermavi in which the Company shall be the direct owner of no less than fifty percent (50%) of Fermavi&#8217;s equity interest, unless the Board of Directors of the Company has previously agreed differently (i.e.; unless the Board of Directors of the Company has approved the existence of equity interests in subsidiaries different from the above) with the affirmative vote of at least one Director appointed by the Investor;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:66PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	(f)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	between the date of exercise of either the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Exit Put Option or the Exit Call Option, as applicable,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;until the date of the effective transfer of the shares and payment of the price to Selling Shareholders,
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	50
</FONT>
</DIV>
