<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:24PX;">
	Section 13.12.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Counterparts; Third Party Beneficiaries
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. This Agreement may be signed in any number of counterparts, each of which will be an original, with the same effect as if the signatures thereto and hereto were upon the same instrument. No provision of this Agreement is intended to confer upon any Person other than the Parties hereto and the Intervening Party any rights or remedies hereunder.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX23_HTM_SAB2E333BAFF403F907A1EC6C5EE854AE">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:113PX;">
	Section 13.13.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Intervening-Consenting Party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. The Company has entered into this Agreement in order to (a) demonstrate its full knowledge of the terms and conditions herein provided and, where applicable, to ensure that all necessary steps will be taken for the full compliance of the terms of this Agreement; and (b) comply with the obligations attributed to it pursuant to this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:113PX;">
	Section 13.14.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Authorization to initialize
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. The Investor hereby authorizes Jo&#227;o Guilherme Soggio Gomes de Oliveira (CPF/MF No. 228.564.828-64), _____________, and Amanda Fernandes Castro (CPF/MF No. 392.821.258-31), _____________, to initialize the Schedules and Exhibits of this Agreement on behalf of the Investor. The Initial Shareholders hereby authorizes Raphael Yukio Hayakawa da Costa (CPF/MF No. 386.550.258-01), _____________, and Francisco Almeida Prado de Andrade Coutinho (CPF/MF No. 317.385.638-47), _____________, to initialize the Schedules and Exhibits of this Agreement on behalf of the Initial Shareholders.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:160%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	In witness whereof, the Parties hereto, together with the Company, have caused this Agreement to be duly signed in seven (7) counterparts, each of which shall be deemed to be an original, but all of which together shall constitute the same agreement, binding upon the Parties, the Company and their respective heirs and successors in the presence of the two (2) witnesses below.
</FONT>

	(ii)

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Whereas, as a result of a redemption of shares of the Company and issuance of new shares pursuant to the exercise of warrants (bonus de subscri&#231;&#227;o) to be implemented before or on the Closing, on the Closing Date the Selling Shareholders will be the legal holders and registered owners of twenty-nine million, five

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Whereas, Compass has irrevocably undertaken to subscribe for newly issued shares of the Company pursuant to the &#8220;Subscription Agreement and Other Covenants&#8221; executed on the date hereof by and among Compass, the Selling Shareholders and other certain shareholders of the Company and, as intervening and consenting party, the Company (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Subscription Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;);
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(iv)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Whereas, the Majority Block Shareholders, Compass and the Company shall execute, on the Closing Date, a &#8220;Shareholders&#8217; Agreement&#8221; of the Company, having the Company as intervening and consenting party, in order to establish the rules that will govern their relationship as shareholders of the Company (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Shareholders&#8217; Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;); and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:48PX;">
	(v)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Whereas, subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, the Selling Shareholders desire to sell to Compass three million, three hundred seventy-three thousand, two hundred eighty-five (3,373,285) shares of the Company (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Purchased Shares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;) representing six point eleven percent (6.11%) of the voting capital stock and five point ninety-nine percent (5.99%) of the total capital of the Company , after the issuance of new shares to the Investor pursuant to the Subscription Agreement, and Compass desires to purchase the Purchased Shares from the Selling Shareholders, free and clear of Liens (except for the Shareholders&#8217; Agreement).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Original Shareholders&#8217; Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; means the shareholders&#8217; agreement executed by the Initial Shareholders on December 12, 2015, which will be filed at the headquarters of the Company pursuant to and for the purposes of Article 118 of the Brazilian Corporations Law.
</FONT>

<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage165"></A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX24_HTM_SDB24758F478867D9805CECF4F66AAB9F">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	Section 1.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Rules of Construction
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	1.2.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Unless otherwise specified, all article, section, exhibit and schedule references used in this Agreement are to articles, sections, exhibits and schedules to this Agreement, which are hereby incorporated by reference into this Agreement and form an integral part hereof.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	1.2.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Any fact or item disclosed in any Schedule&#160;and/or Exhibit hereof shall not by reason only of such inclusion be deemed to be material and shall not be employed as a point of reference in determining any standard of materiality under this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	1.2.3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The term &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	includes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; or &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	including
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; shall mean &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	including without limitation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.&#8221; The words &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	hereof
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	,&#8221; &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	hereto
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	,&#8221; &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	hereby
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	,&#8221; &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	herein
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	,&#8221; &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	hereunder
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221; and words of similar import, when used in this Agreement, shall refer to this Agreement as a whole and not to any particular section or article in which such words appear.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	1.2.4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Whenever this Agreement refers to a number of days, such number shall refer to calendar days unless Business Days are specified. Whenever any action must be taken hereunder on or by a day that is not a Business Day, then such action may be validly taken on or by the next Business Day. Any and all time period set forth in this Agreement shall be counted pursuant to Article 132 of the Brazilian Civil Code (Law No. 10,406/2002).
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	1.2.5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Reference to a given agreement, instrument, document or Applicable Law is a reference to that agreement, instrument, document or Applicable Law as validly modified, amended, supplemented and restated through the date as of which such reference is made and, as to any Applicable Law, any successor Applicable Law.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	1.2.6.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Except if otherwise stated herein, the captions in this Agreement are for convenience only and shall not be considered a part of or affect the construction or interpretation of any provision of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<A NAME="eolPage166"></A>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX24_HTM_S9DAE24FC9D62CBA05DB2ECF4F6BC878C">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE 2 &#8211; PURCHASE AND SALE, PURCHASE PRICE AND PAYMENT
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX24_HTM_S251AF05D69EB92F9966CECF4F711634B">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	Section 2.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Purchase and Sale
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. The Parties hereby irrevocably and irreversibly agree that, on the Closing Date, the Selling Shareholders shall sell and transfer to Compass, and Compass shall purchase from the Selling Shareholders, all of the Purchased Shares of the Company, according to the proportional number of shares to be sold by each Selling Shareholder as indicated in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 2.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;below.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX24_HTM_S2828296DEBC8FEF8F338ECF4F7638536">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:96PX;">
	Section 2.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Purchase Price
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. In consideration of the purchase and sale of the Purchased Shares set forth herein, Compass shall pay to the Selling Shareholders an aggregate amount of seventy-seven million, three hundred seventy-four thousand, four hundred and six Reais and ninety-two Centavos (R$ 77,374,406.92) (the &#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Purchase Price
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;), which is based on a price per share of R$ 22.9374058 and which was calculated as detailed in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit II
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;and was based on (i) the estimated adjusted EBITDA of the Company for the year ended December 31, 2015, in the total amount of R$&#160;185 million (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Estimated Adjusted EBITDA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;), multiplied by 9.5x, less (ii) the estimated Net Debt of the Company as of December 31, 2015, in the total amount of R$&#160;840 million (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Estimated Net Debt
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;), both of which were calculated in good faith pursuant to the methods described in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibits I
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	III
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. The Purchase Price will be subject to the Post-Closing Adjustment in accordance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 3.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;below. For the sake of completeness, the table below sets forth the number of shares that each Selling Shareholder will sell to the Investor, and which shall be used for purpose of payment of the Purchase Price to each Selling Shareholder:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;PADDING-BOTTOM:9PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage167"></A>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX24_HTM_SC48E248B940BF31C4EAEECF4F7B797F4">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	Section 2.3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Payment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Compass shall pay the Purchase Price to the Selling Shareholders, proportionally to the number of shares sold in accordance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 2.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;above, on the Closing Date, in immediately available funds, without any deduction, set-off, counterclaim or withholdings (except for any withholding of Taxes due on capital gain in accordance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 2.3.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;below), by means of a transfer of funds to the bank accounts informed in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit IV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. The final amount of the Purchase Price will be subject to the Post-Closing Adjustment and shall be increased or decreased pursuant to the mechanism set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 3.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;below.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	2.3.1.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;The remittance of foreign funds by Compass for the purposes of payment of the Purchase Price shall include the necessary amounts for the payment of the Brazilian tax on credit transactions (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Imposto Sobre Opera&#231;&#245;es de Cr&#233;dito, C&#226;mbio e Seguro ou relativas a T&#237;tulos ou Valores Mobili&#225;rios &#8211; IOF
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	) and all applicable fees in connection with the currency exchange agreements that shall be executed for the receipt of such payments, i.e. any and all Taxes and fees in connection with the remittance of any portion of the Purchase Price and execution of the currency exchange agreements, which shall be borne solely by Compass.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	2.3.2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Compass shall pay the Purchase Price to each Selling Shareholder, in the following manner: (i) for the Selling Shareholders domiciled in Brazil, payment of the Purchase Price shall be made by means of an electronic wire transfer of immediately available funds, to such banking account in Brazil as designated to Compass pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit IV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	, and (ii) for the Selling Shareholders domiciled outside of Brazil, by means of an exchange agreement in order to effect an electronic wire transfer of immediately available funds, with the remittance of such immediately available funds, to such banking account outside Brazil as designated to Compass pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit IV,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	and Selling Shareholders acknowledge that after the remittance of such of immediately available funds, the monies thereto related may be only available within the customary transaction time applicable for operations of similar nature. The determination of the amount in foreign currency that will be delivered to each of the Selling Shareholders domiciled outside of Brazil to fulfill the payment of the Purchase Price, shall be calculated in accordance with the average of the closing dollar buy/sell rates (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	taxa de compra/taxa de venda
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	) published by the Central Bank of Brazil for the Business Day prior to the Closing Date. As a condition for the payment of the Purchase Price to the Selling Shareholders domiciled outside of Brazil, the Selling Shareholders domiciled outside of Brazil shall deliver to Compass, at least three (3) Business Days in advance of the Closing Date, a chart demonstrating the calculation of all Taxes on capital
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	15
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage168"></A>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX24_HTM_SC48E248B940BF31C4EAEECF4F7B797F4">
</A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	gains that shall be paid as a result of the sale of the Purchased Shares in accordance with Section 26 of Law No. 10.833/06, which shall be withheld and paid to the relevant Governmental Authorities by Compass.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	2.3.2.1 Selling Shareholders domiciled outside of Brazil hereby expressly represent and warrant to Compass that the calculation of the Taxes on capital gains delivered to Compass according to Section 2.3.2 and the amounts indicated therein as cost of acquisition of their respective investments in the Company are accurate and supported by adequate documentation and therefore hereby expressly agree to hold harmless against, defend and indemnify Compass and its Affiliates, pursuant to Section 6.4 below, against any and all Losses related to the Tax on capital gains that shall be paid as a result of the sale of the Purchased Shares in the amounts so informed by the Selling Shareholders domiciled outside of Brazil.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX24_HTM_S97AC8CA2D055898FA066ECF4F80AD1C3">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE 3 &#8211; CLOSING OBLIGATIONS AND POST-CLOSING ADJUSTMENT
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX24_HTM_SB9541DB8E92C06EDDDE6ECF4F85E41B9">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	Section 3.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Closing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Upon the terms of this Agreement, the closing of the Transaction set forth in this Agreement, the Subscription Agreement and the Shareholders&#8217; Agreement (&#8220;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Closing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#8221;) shall take place at 10:00 a.m., on the Closing Date, at the offices of Mattos Filho, Veiga Filho, Marrey Jr. e Quiroga Advogados, located at Alameda Joaquim Eug&#234;nio de Lima, 447, in the City of S&#227;o Paulo, State of S&#227;o Paulo, Brazil, or as otherwise agreed by the Parties.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:12PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX24_HTM_S84F3287E49E399FAFAA9ECF4F8B02E4D">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	Section 3.2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Closing Obligations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. At the Closing, the following actions and transactions shall be carried out, which actions and transactions shall all be deemed to take place simultaneously and no action or transaction shall be deemed to have been completed or any document delivered until such actions and transactions have been completed and the required documents delivered:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	(a)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	The Selling Shareholders shall release the Purchased Shares from the Original Shareholders&#8217;&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Agreement in order to allow for the sale, as the case may be;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	16
</FONT>
</DIV>
</DIV>
<HR STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
<A NAME="eolPage169"></A>
<DIV>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Compass shall pay the Purchase Price to the Selling Shareholders, in accordance with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 2.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	(c)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the Selling Shareholders shall deliver to Compass an executed copy of a receipt for the Purchase Price, in the form attached hereto as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit V
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	;
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	(d)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the Parties and the Company shall cause Ita&#250; Unibanco in its capacity of book-keeping agent (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	escriturador
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	) in charge of the registration of the Company&#8217;s shares, to register the Purchased Shares in the name of Compass, therefore transferring the Purchased Shares to Compass, free and clear of Liens (except for the Shareholders&#8217; Agreement); and
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>

<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:46PX;">
</TD>
<TD>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;FONT-SIZE:11PT;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="VERTICAL-ALIGN:TOP;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	the Company shall execute the relevant annotations with Ita&#250; Unibanco in its capacity of book-keeping agent (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	escriturador
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	) in charge of the registration of the Company&#8217;s shares, reflecting the ownership of the Purchased Shares by Compass.
</FONT>
</DIV>
</TD>
</TR>

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX24_HTM_SE83BB25639CD10EBF0ECECF4F9040D16">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	Section 3.3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Transfer of the Purchased Shares
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Upon payment of the Purchase Price to the Selling Shareholders, each of the Parties agrees to take all actions permitted by applicable law that may be reasonably necessary to give effect to the settlement of the transfer of the Purchased Shares set forth herein, which actions may include, without limitation, (i) voting or causing to be voted any shares of the Company, (ii) causing the adoption of shareholders resolutions and amendments to the Company&#8217;s by-laws, (iii) executing agreements or instruments, including their amendments, and (iv) making, or causing to be made, with any competent authority all filings, approvals, registrations or similar actions that are required to achieve such result.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX24_HTM_S5DF4FDC1308E0F1172DFECF4F9577802">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:144%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	Section 3.4.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Actual Adjusted EBITDA and Actual Net Debt
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;PADDING-LEFT:46PX;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	3.4.1. Within five (5) days of the earlier of (i) the issuance of the audited financial statements of the Company and Fermavi for the year ended on December 31, 2015, or (ii) March 31, 2016, the Parties shall follow the
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	procedures set forth in Section 3.3 of the Subscription Agreement for the purposes of calculating the Actual Adjusted EBITDA and the Actual Net Debt.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	3.4.2.&#160;&#160;&#160;&#160;Throughout all of the procedures for the calculation of the Actual Adjusted EBITDA and the Actual Net Debt, the Selling Shareholders shall be represented by Peach and Gerhard during all negotiations and understandings with Compass and the Accounting Expert, with full powers to act on behalf of all Selling Shareholders.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	Section 3.5.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Post-Closing Adjustment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Upon final definition of the Actual Adjusted EBITDA and the Actual Net Debt, pursuant to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Section 3.4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	&#32;above, the Parties shall proceed as set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Exhibit VII

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	ARTICLE 4 &#8211; REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES OF THE SELLING SHAREHOLDERS AND THE COMPANY
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	Each of the Selling Shareholders and the Company, individually, hereby represents and warrants to Compass, as of the date hereof:
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<BR>
</FONT>
</DIV>
<A NAME="CMP-20151231X10KXEX24_HTM_S6B675493EBC9BB65F49DECF4FA517FA3">
</A>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	Section 4.1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Organization, Power and Authority
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Each of the Selling Shareholders that is a natural person has the ownership, power and authority to execute and deliver this Agreement and to perform its respective obligations hereunder. Each of the Selling Shareholders that is a corporate entity and the Company are duly incorporated and validly existing under the Applicable Laws of its jurisdiction of incorporation and has the requisite corporate power and authority to carry on its respective business as currently conducted. Each of the Selling Shareholders that is a corporate entity and the Company has the requisite corporate power and authority to execute and deliver this Agreement and to perform its respective obligations hereunder. The execution, delivery and performance of this Agreement and the transactions contemplated hereby have been duly and validly authorized by all requisite corporate action on the part of each Selling Shareholder that is a corporate entity and the Company.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:120%;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	18
</FONT>
</DIV>

<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Enforceability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. This Agreement has been duly and validly executed and delivered by Selling Shareholders and Company and constitutes a valid and binding agreement of Selling Shareholders and the Company enforceable against the Selling Shareholders and Company in accordance with its terms in any court having jurisdiction over the Selling Shareholders and the Company, subject to bankruptcy, insolvency, reorganization, moratorium and other similar Applicable Laws that affect creditors&#8217; rights generally.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	Section 4.3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	No Violation or Breach
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	. Neither the execution or delivery of this Agreement nor the consummation of the transactions and performance of the terms and conditions of this Agreement by the Selling Shareholders, and the Company shall (i) result in a violation or breach of or default under any provision of the by-laws of the Company and/or its Subsidiaries (as defined in the Subscription Agreement); (ii) violate, conflict with, result in the breach of, constitute a default under, be prohibited by, require any additional approval under, accelerate the performance provided by, require the assumption of, give any third party the right to terminate or result (a) in the creation of any Lien upon any of the properties or assets of Company and/or its Subsidiaries (as defined in the Subscription Agreement) or (b) in any other change in right or obligation or the loss of a benefit under any term, condition or provision of any material contract to which the Company and/or its Subsidiaries (as defined in the Subscription Agreement) is now a party; or (iii) violate any Applicable Law by which the Company and/or its Subsidiaries (as defined in the Subscription Agreement) or any of their assets may be bound or affected, except in the case of clauses (ii) and (iii), to the extent that such violation does not impair or delay the ability of the Selling Shareholders and/or the Company to perform their obligations hereunder.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-INDENT:0PX;">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;PADDING-RIGHT:0PX;">
	Section 5.3.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">

Neither the execution or delivery of this Agreement nor the consummation of the Transaction and performance of the terms and conditions of this Agreement by Compass shall (i)&#160;result in a violation or breach of or default under any provision of the by-laws (or other foundational instrument) of Compass; (ii) violate, conflict with, result in the breach of, constitute a default under, be
</FONT>
</DIV>
<BR>
<DIV STYLE="TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;">

	20

<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;PADDING-LEFT:0PX;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	prohibited by, require any additional approval under, accelerate the performance provided by, require the assumption of, give any third party the right to terminate or result in any other change in right or obligation or the loss of a benefit under any term, condition or provision of any material contract to which Compass is a party or by which it is bound; or (iii) violate any Applicable Law by which Compass or any of its assets may be bound or affected, except in the case of clauses (ii) and (iii), to the extent that such violation does not impair or delay the ability of Compass to perform its obligations hereunder.
</FONT>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:193%;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
